perturbation.original_text:
2.
The Principal grants Distributor non- exclusive rights to sell these products within the countries of Romania (the “Territory”), which may be amended by mutual written agreement.
perturbation.changed_text:
2.
The Principal grants Distributor non- exclusive rights to sell these products within the countries of Romania (the “Territory”). The Territory may be expanded or reduced at the sole discretion of the Principal, without the need for mutual agreement.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states the territory can only be amended by mutual written agreement. The modified text gives the Principal the unilateral right to change the territory, directly contradicting the original requirement for mutual agreement. This creates uncertainty about the Distributor's rights within the initially defined territory.

perturbation.original_text:
4.
The Principal shall maintain the right to contact and market its products to potential customers in the Territory; but agrees to pass on all sales leads and orders to the Distributor.
perturbation.changed_text:
4.
The Principal shall maintain the right to contact and market its products to potential customers in the Territory and may directly fulfill sales in the territory at their discretion; the Principal is not obligated to pass on sales leads and orders to the Distributor.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states the Principal agrees to pass on all sales leads and orders to the Distributor. The modified text states the Principal is not obligated to pass on the sales lead to the distributor. This creates uncertainty about the Distributor's ability to make sales within the initially defined territory, contradicting the premise of a distribution agreement.

perturbation.original_text:
10.
This Agreement shall be in effect until March 18. 2021, unless sooner terminated by either party upon (30) days written notice, without cause.
perturbation.changed_text:
10.
This Agreement shall be in effect until March 18. 2021. The Principal may terminate this agreement at any time, for any reason, without notice. The Distributor may terminate only with 90 days written notice.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states that the agreement could be terminated with 30 days notice from either party. The modification allows the Principal to terminate without notice, while requiring the Distributor to give 90 days' notice, creating an imbalance and contradiction in termination rights.
